Articles.Content: I've been playing KSP on and off for several years now, the last version I really played was 0.25 I believe and I remember spending days on it ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif) now I'm back and wow, the official realease is just....beautiful, combined with mods with is perhaps one of my favorite games. So yeah, I decided to join because I'm always browsing them, might as well get in here and perhaps contribute something.

Hello Gad, and welcome!

It's always good to welcome another lurker into the community.

Happy landings!

Lots have changed since 0.25... even if it was only 2 major releases ago. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

Welcome, Gad!

Heh, yeah seems like 0.25 was so long ago, but also not. Planes have definitely changed (just a little).

Anyway... Welcome to the forums! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Cheers,

~Claw
